barcolor.command.description: Sets the color of your bar!
cardcolor.command.description: Set the color of your card!
circlecolor.command.description: Set the color of your card circle!
namecolor.command.description: Set the color of your name!
contactcreator.command.description: Contact the creator of the bot!
suggestion.command.description: Suggest a feature for the bot!
checkbans.command.description: Remove banned users from levels database!
checklblevels.command.description: Checks the levels of all the users in the leaderboad!
checklevels.command.description: Checks the levels of a specific user!
checkranks.command.description: Adds/removes transformation roles from users depending on their level!
patreon.command.description: Set or get list of patreons!
excludechannel.command.description: Excludes a channel from earning xp!
levelchannel.command.description: Sets channel where level ups go to!
messagemaxlength.command.description: Set maximum length of message to give XP!
messagemax.command.description: Set maximum of messages per minute!
messageminlength.command.description: Set minimum length of message to give XP!
customcommandlist.command.description: List custom commands or messages of a custom command!
testml.command.description: Test output of a card at a level!
customisationcode.command.description: Set your customisation settings to a code, or get your customisation code!
ramusage.command.description: Get RAM usage by the bot!
tictactoe.command.description: Play Tic Tac Toe with another member in the server!
cah.command.description: Play Cards Against Winx with members in the server!
rps.command.description: Play Rock Paper Scissors with a friend!
wingslevel.command.description: Set an already achieved transformation as your wings!
